html:
12.27.22  7:16 pm   What scale/mode do you recommend a beginner start practicing improvisation in?

      start with just one note. a lot of possibilities with just one note. such as: when to play it, when to stop playing it, ..... how long in between when you started and stopped the note, ..... how long in between when you stopped and started the note, ......

12.27.22  6:13 pm   what's the most satisfying thing ever

      doing a mathematical calculation in 2 different ways and getting the same result

12.27.22  4:33 pm   Are you continuing the series of two people with very odd dialogue

      yes

12.27.22  3:39 pm   how would you respond if i told you i really like the chorus in where i've been

      i'm not sure. so far this is all hypothetical really

12.27.22  2:54 pm   how do you come up with song lyrics

      musically

12.27.22  2:16 pm   What's the weirdest music you've ever heard?

      i have never heard weird music

12.27.22  1:12 pm   is pi real?

     yep

     like, is it really plausible?

      just barely

12.27.22  12:27 pm   why are the days between christmas and the new year so liminal and strange?

      because christmas and new years are both huge holidays. normal business is altered significantly

12.27.22  10:14 am   is pink floyd an inspiration on your music?

      the idea of pink floyd inspires me

12.27.22  8:23 am   why is it so easy to hate your own art/music?

     because you care

      what can i do about this?

     try to imagine how often people who's music/art you like, might hate their own sometimes

12.27.22  7:22 am   how do i know if time has passed

      it has

12.27.22  5:24 am   What is your favourite word?

      changing from word to word. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

12.27.22  4:57 am   why are oranges called oranges but apples are not called reds or bananas arent called yellows

      because it goes the other way. indeed, some colors are called 'apple', and some colors are called 'banana'

12.27.22  1:36 am   how do i reach clarity

      try to listen in on a conversation between the ground and the sky

12.27.22  1:35 am   it looks like most/all of your recent videos are 3d. does this mean that all (if not most) of the videos will be 3d?

      i suppose that's one way to do it

12.26.22  11:31 pm   when is bedtime?

      right now. give it a try

12.26.22  9:52 pm   what is the dark side of the moon?

      sometimes it means the side that faces away from us, which is always the same side but sometimes it's light. the only way to see that side is to travel there

12.26.22  9:08 pm   what's your favorite year?

      whichever one is the current one

12.26.22  7:35 pm   What, in your opinion, is the most beautiful piece of music ever written?

      a lot of what makes music beautiful is what else was going on before or during it

12.26.22  6:49 pm   do you make a song then think of music videos or do you just make up the video while writing/making the song

      thinking of visual scenes is actually a great writing trick for songwriting, but that's more to help the songwriting than to help the video. when it's time to do the video i think about it anew

12.26.22  6:27 pm   Why do you think we use the word "won't" as the contraction for "will not" instead of the more orthographically-compliant "willn't" or "win't"?

      maybe it used to be willn't, but then in years and years of conversation, it got said shorter and started to merge conceptually with "wouldn't" or "don't". Also i can see why there would be a natural need for something that sounds more different from "will", its opposite

12.26.22  5:53 pm   i feel like a bad person.

      that's normal sometimes

12.26.22  5:43 pm   whats the best drum beat

      bap

12.26.22  12:16 pm   When I talk to individuals who I esteem as good at music, they will tell me to use regular chords and chord progressions ( like C F C G or whatever the most prominent chord progressions are these days) but I want to use crazy chords that are abnormal. Admittedly don't usually sound great. Should I pursue the chords I want to, or lean into the more basic chords for the musical stability of knowing that it won't sound super bad?

      try anything you want. see what you like

12.26.22  9:42 am   Are the 2 friends on the beach living in an infinite cycle?

      not quite

12.26.22  9:20 am   why is Christmas trying to be fake?

      potential for enormous profits

12.26.22  7:18 am   My friend lied to me about our entire relationship. So anyways, how do you feel about pumpkin scented candle?

      it's a natural counter balance to the candle scented pumpkin

12.26.22  4:36 am   In out to lunch when the character is juggling and says "y'know, I'm finally starting to feel more comfortable" does that have a deeper meaning? (And If so, what does it mean) Or is it just simply about the guy feeling better about juggling? 

      it just has a little slant to it. there are multiple things about it that seem slightly 'off' but not really. like a 20% slant all around. that's my idea of a good time at the cinema

12.26.22  2:24 am   How do you keep predicting the future? There are quite a lot of videos that predicted 2020 on your channel

      i don't recall announcing it, but i've known about 2020 for a long time. i can also tell you that 2030 should be coming up in just about 7 years

12.26.22  1:46 am   Is mathematics based on a true story?

      even better, it's based on truth..... actually, even better, ..... it is the truth

12.26.22  1:35 am   Why are your videos so good

      hopefully that gives me some leeway in case any of them are not good

12.25.22  10:56 pm   what to do if im too stupid  for my own good

      you could give some intelligence lessons

12.25.22  8:05 pm   Did you do anything special on Christmas?

      yes but not for christmas

12.25.22  7:32 pm   do you like ideas

      yes

12.25.22  7:22 pm   If you removed the peanut from a peanut M&M, is it a peanutless peanut m&m or just an m&m?

      if you do the algebra you can cancel out the peanut/peanutless

12.25.22  4:12 pm   what's the best chord progression 

      Am, F, C, G

12.25.22  2:27 pm   Why don't we use amn't, for a contraction? Looks/sounds good to me.

      it morphed into ain't

12.25.22  1:18 pm   what's the most average sized thing in the universe?

      a chair

12.25.22  12:52 pm   Why don't people say "Happy Christmas and Merry New Year"?

      a lot of people do say that

12.25.22  12:29 pm   did you hear footsteps on your roof today?

      no

12.25.22  11:12 am   where do songs come from?

      i have no idea

12.25.22  9:52 am   when you write a song, you start with lyrics/melody. what comes after that?

     finalize what key it's in based on how it feels to sing it

      do you also come up with the chords at the same time?

     yep

     how about the harmonies and the drums when you start producing it?

     i do that when i'm producing it

     what's your go-to next step after having lyrics and melody written/composed?

     the melody/lyric also includes chords. song 'writing' for me includes lyrics, melody, chords, exact tempo, exact roadmap, and any other obvious details that make the song what it is. after the writing is done, the next step is to double check the tempo and then see if the key needs to be raised so it works for 'concert voice' instead of 'writing desk voice'. Then i get a timeline going, set the metronome, and record some temp instruments just for the purpose of singing final vocal over it, then record all vocals. then remove all temp instruments and then arrange and record the instruments. then mix

12.25.22  9:35 am   i hunger for food, do you share this hunger

      sometimes

12.25.22  9:13 am   Do you know how to code?

      i can usually figure it out

12.25.22  2:40 am   I need to get my friend a last-minute Christmas gift. What would you recommend?

      everyone chooses the same minute. pick a totally different minute. give someone a gift in June

12.25.22  1:24 am   why is the first step always the most difficult

      because there haven't been any other steps so far, so of course it's the most difficult, so far. there are some later steps that are more difficult actually

12.25.22  12:20 am   is "i just did a bad thing" based on the experience of getting a bad grade

      no

      you might be in latin america

12.24.22  10:36 pm   Is Christmas real?

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake
